title: Consume one more unit if MB exceeds MC

content.question: Marginal analysis suggests that an individual will consume one additional unit of a good if the

choices.label: total benefit is less than the total cost
total benefit is greater than the total cost
additional benefit is less than the additional cost
additional benefit is greater than the additional cost

content.answer: additional benefit is greater than the additional cost
